description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.8   (restriction of permitted development rights from residential (Use Class C3) to small HMO (Use Class C4)), pursuant to planning permission reference 244299FUL dated 24/01/2025 for: Conversion of single dwellinghouse into two self-contained flats with provision of cycle and refuse storage.
decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as a minor material amendments to planning permission reference 244299FUL dated 24/01/2025, in accordance with Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for 'Minor material Amendments following grant of planning permission', on the following grounds:

The implementation of a small HMO could lead to potential noise, disturbance, increased traffic and could be considered out of character along the streetscene and therefore impact visual appearance. As such, it is required to assess the impact of a HMO and ensure it does not harm the area's character or neighbours' living conditions in accordance with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (updated 2025) and Ealing SPG10.
